definitions.body: David's sister's son & captain of his host (LXX )Iwab) 1Sa 26:6, 2Sa 2:13 + 100 t. 2 S (also 2Sa 20:6 for MT [[אֲבִישַׁי]] cf. SyrVer We Dr); 1Ki 1:7 + 14 t. 1 K; 1Ch 2:16 + 22 t. 1 Ch; Ps 60:2. †
a descendant of Judah 1Ch 4:14 (but LXX B LXXL )Iwbab). †
a family-name after the exile Ezr 2:6 = Ne 7:11 (LXX )Iwbab, )Iwab) Ezr 8:9 (LXX )Iwab).
